verbs.description: < p > Barrack [V: was] interviewed as part of the federal investigation of possible coordination between the Trump campaign and Russia in the 2016 election , according to three sources.</p >

< p > [ARG1: Barrack] was [V: interviewed] [ARG2: as part of the federal investigation of possible coordination between the Trump campaign and Russia in the 2016 election] , according to three sources.</p >
< p > Barrack was interviewed as part of the federal investigation of possible coordination between the Trump campaign and Russia in the 2016 election , [V: according] to three sources.</p >
